description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fruitbash is challenging puzzle action: Either try to solve all puzzles in the campaign mode or prove your reflexes when you're battling against up to 4 other players via XBOX Live!
description.short: Fruitbash is challenging puzzle action: Either try to solve all puzzles in the campaign mode or prove your reflexes when you're battling against up to 4 other players via XBOX Live!
